definition: reign name of Ming emperor (1573-1619)
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
calendar

sentences.english: The Wan-li period is a critical period for the Ming Dynasty's collapse.
sentences.chinese: 明萬曆時期是明王朝走向崩潰的一個重要時期。

sentences.english: Wanli emperor decided was conferring the king of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 萬曆帝決定冊封豐臣秀吉爲日本國王。

sentences.english: Content: In the Wan-li times' literary world of the Ming Dynasty, Li Wei-zhenwas characteristic of special status.
sentences.chinese: 在明萬曆年間的文壇上，李維楨有着獨特的地位。

sentences.english: As the story goes that Huang Jiashan and Zhou Rudi had studied at here in Ming Dynasty Wan Li years (about 1550-1615).
sentences.chinese: 傳說，明朝萬曆年間，黃嘉善和周如砥在這裏讀書。

sentences.english: The Ding Mausoleum is a tomb of Emperor Wanli (Ming Dynasty) and his two empresses.
sentences.chinese: 定陵是明代萬曆皇帝及其兩皇后的陵墓。

sentences.english: Five-colored basin with Human figure design in various scenes, Wanli Era of Ming Dynasty, excavated from Andingmen, Dongcheng District, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 景德鎮窯五彩人物故事圖盆，明萬曆年，安定門出土。

sentences.english: This study discusses love writing and reading for "Ancient China Brothel" during the late Wan-Li of the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 本篇論文以萬曆後期青樓的情愛書寫與閱讀爲中心。

sentences.english: During the late Wanli era, the situation of illegal trade with Japan was severer than that of the Jiajing period.
sentences.chinese: 萬曆後期的違禁通番貿易，較之嘉靖後期更盛。

sentences.english: Ming Wanli due to transfer all Dongguan Xiang Mu Hong Kong has only one said.
sentences.chinese: 明萬曆年間因轉運東莞所有香木始有香港一稱。
